text: Whoa, 100 million Americans with medical debt? That's crazy! 😱 And I thought health insurance was supposed to help with that? 🤔 High-deductible plans seem like a recipe for disaster. 💸💥 Can't afford food or housing because of medical bills? 🍔🏠 That's not right. And don't even get me started on dental bills! 😷 It's like, you're damned if you do, and damned if you don't. 🤷‍♂️ Something's gotta give, right? 💪
